titleStmt.title: Lamentable newes, shewing the wonderfull deliuerance of Maister Edmond Pet sayler and maister of a ship, dwelling in Seething Lane in London, neere Barking church. With other strange things lately hapned concerning these great windes and tempestuous weather, both at sea and lande.
Lamentable newes, shewing the wonderfull deliverance of Maister Edmond Pet sayler.

publicationStmt.publisher: By T. C[reede] for William Barley, dwelling ouer against Cree-church, neere Algate,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Great losses by sea and land.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
